WASAL: Morocco’s First Social Shopping Experience - Fashion, Beauty & Lifestyle

Step into a whole new way to socialize, shop and get inspired. WASAL brings together the best of
fashion, beauty, tech, home and lifestyle into one immersive, trend-driven social shopping
experience — made for Morocco, and made for you.

Explore 14 Curated Worlds
Fashion, Menswear, Beauty, Tech, Moroccan Vibes, Home & Deco, Mother & Baby, Teens, Kids,
Gifts, Sports & Wellness, Smart Deals & more — each tailored to your style, needs and mood.

Shop What You See, Instantly
Scroll through shoppable videos, photos and looks. Tap on any product to buy it instantly, or save
to your wishlist for future inspiration or gifting.

 Seamless WhatsApp Checkout
Enjoy a fast and personal shopping journey via WhatsApp. Get real-time support and delivery
from just 2 hours anywhere in Morocco.

 Follow WASAL’ERS — or Become One
Connect with trendsetters who post daily looks, product reviews, collections, inspiration and
lifestyle content. Have a style to share? Become a WASAL’ER and earn when others shop your
looks.

Smart Shopping, Made Personal
• Filter collections by category, brand, color, size & price
• Get alerts when new arrivals drop or deals go live
• Discover exclusive sales, local brands & gift-worthy picks
• Share curated boards and wishlists with friends

Delivery You Can Count On
WASAL delivers with fast, tracked shipping throughout Morocco, starting from 2 hour delivery.
Style it. Share it. Shop it. Your world, your way — only on WASAL.

Download WASAL now and explore the lifestyle you love, at your fingertips.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Live your best sporting life with the adidas app. Discover an online shopping experience bringing you the latest sports clothing, trainers, and accessories from the brand with the 3-Stripes. Conveniently find the shoes and apparel fit for any sport or training program by searching in the adidas app. Join adiClub today and explore content, rewards, and online shopping deals for your favourite adidas sportswear.

adidas is your one-stop clothing and shoe store for trainers, football boots, running shoes, and sports clothes for all ages. Enhance your online shopping experience with exclusive access to the latest sports shoe drops and the most up-to-date sportswear releases, delivered straight to your fingertips.

Convenient online shopping for your favourite adidas apparel, shoes, and accessories is just a tap away. Find your favourite football boots, trainers, tracksuits, running shoes, and sports clothing with our robust search functionality and discover the styles you love. Filter by size, colour, price, sport, and more. Complete the simple and secure checkout process and your products will be on their way. adidas brings the ultimate sportswear and sneakers app to the palm of your hand.

Get more than just a clothing and shoe store. With adiClub, you get exclusive membership benefits. Earn points on purchases, access limited edition drops, and invitations to special events. Get access to exclusive celebrity collaborations with global superstars, from Lionel Messi to Kylie Jenner. Enjoy curated content, sportswear tips, and sporting inspiration all when you join adiClub.

Download adidas to enjoy online shopping with your favourite sports clothing, shoe drops, and exclusive content. All in or nothing – enhance your active lifestyle with adidas today.

THE ULTIMATE SPORTS CLOTHING & SHOE SHOP
- Trainers, sportswear, running shoes, football boots, and much more – adidas has you covered
- Access your favourite lifestyle fits with the adidas clothing and sneakers app
- Tracksuits, classic shoes, and more. Shop timeless adidas styles

ONLINE SHOPPING - MADE CONVENIENT
- adidas is the clothing and shoe store that brings you the tools to enhance your online shopping experience
- Browse and search the styles you love with helpful filters
- Seamlessly build your next outfit and check out in just a few taps

JOIN ADICLUB
- Earn points with adidas. Get rewarded for shopping, completing your profile, and leaving reviews.
- Use your points for exclusive discounts for online shopping deals on your favourite collections
- Get invited to special events and even vote on members-only adidas products
- Access exclusive content and limited edition drops with your adiClub membership

MORE THAN JUST SHOPPING
- Enjoy curated content covering your favourite apparel, shoes, and sports
- Get inspired by top athletes and celebrities through exclusive collaborations
- Tailor your 3-Stripes feed to you and enjoy personalised sports content

All sports. All passions. All in. Download the adidas app today for an exclusive portal into unmatched online shopping and sportswear experiences.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Téléchargez dès maintenant l'application marjanemall et découvrez une nouvelle façon de faire votre achat en ligne !

marjanemall, la  marketplace marocaine de confiance qui offre l’expérience d’achat la plus libre, la plus équitable et 100% sécurisée.

Grâce à sa marketplace, l’application marjanemall va plus loin et vous propose un large choix d’univers : téléphones et objets connectés, TV, son et photos, informatique et gaming, électroménager, maison, cuisine et décoration, beauté et santé, vêtements, chaussures & accessoires, bébé et jouets, sport, auto-moto, bricolage, jardin animalerie, librairie…

L'application marjanemall, c'est quoi ?
- Près de 15 univers proposant le meilleur des grandes marques et produits nationaux et internationaux authentiques aux justes prix, payés à la livraison ou en dirham convertible et livrés à travers tout le Maroc.
- L'accès à des promotions exclusives en lien avec nos opérations incontournables, comme les soldes, le Black Friday, le Back to School, les fêtes de fin d’année etc. Via nos notifications mobiles. Vous aurez également accès à des coupons exclusifs sur notre application uniquement !
- Un compte client intuitif avec suivi de vos commandes, consultation de vos coupons, gestion de vos préférences de communications, de vos adresses, le tout en quelques clics.
- Un suivi centralisé des demandes et réclamations client. 
Notre service client reste à votre disposition 7/7 jours de 9h à 21H via formulaire de contact, WhatsApp, réseaux sociaux ou par téléphone sur le 0802007700.

N'attendez plus, installez dès maintenant l'application marjanemall et commencez à profiter de tous ces avantages incroyables !

Avoid crowds, stay safe and shop from the comfort of your home. With Jumia, you open your doors to savings and convenience!
Shop safely and conveniently online with Jumia, the largest online retailer in Africa.

So what exactly do you get with the Jumia app? 

- Daily exclusive app only Flash sales on top products
- Special Treasure hunts with guaranteed prizes
- Faster access to deals
- Exclusive app-only discounts
- Fast and Free shipping in select cities across Africa!
- Exclusive app only vouchers

With the Jumia App, shop safe and convenient online!

Download the Jumia Online Shopping App today for the best shopping experience in Africa. Great discounts, hassle free payment options, easy returns and 100% genuine items guaranteed!

From fashion to electronics, find anything you need on Africa’s largest online shopping store. Enjoy a large selection of international and local brands to choose from and shop 100% genuine products only at Jumia! 

Payment made easy with secure payment options such as cash on delivery, mobile money or pay using your credit card with our secure payment system Jumia Pay.

So you ask, what can I shop at Jumia? 
We sell millions of products, download the app and search what you are looking for. Some top items include:

- Mobile Phones & Tablets
- Laptops, Notebooks, Desktops and accessories
- Appliances, TVs, Games, Consoles, Home Theatres 
- Sporting Goods, Lifestyle products
- Fashion for all - Men, Woman, Kids & Babies
- Baby Necessities - Diapers, Skincare, Toys and all
- Health & Beauty Products - Make up, perfumes, Hair care, Oral care & more
- Home & Living - Furniture, Decor, Bedding, Kitchen Essentials
- Grocery Items & Supplies - Yes you read that right

With the Jumia Shopping App, you get:
- Customized shopping experience with a personalized feed
- Buyer protection 
- Cross-platform shopping, whether on a smartphone, a tablet or even on a desktop, Jumia app will keep all the products on your cart as long as you are logged in to your account.
- Order management from our call center, our call center will call you to inform about the status of your order
- International shopping experience from brands like  Apple, Canon, HP, Pampers, Moulinex, L’Oreal, Samsung, Tefal and many more!

Operating in more than 11 markets in Africa, the Jumia Online Shopping Application is available in Arabic, English and French. Our in-house customer service strives hard to provide you with impeccable service to all your questions in English, French, Arabic or the respective regional languages of the countries.

We always look forward to provide the best customer experience,  share your feedback with us to help us achieve that goal.

** DISCLAIMER **
We have been informed that our app is fraudulently advertised by third-party advertisers, mostly in the form of fake vouchers or offers. These ads are published without our consent and we highly regret and condemn this behavior.

If you encounter any of these issues, please help us and copy the page URL found and report it to jumia.online.shopping@jumia.com with subject "Fraudulent Ad" so that we can take the ad down.

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons.

Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

VOS COURSES CHEZ VOUS EN MOINS DE 60 MINUTES OU AU CRÉNEAU HORAIRE DE VOTRE CHOIX !

Comment ça marche ?
	1.	Téléchargez l’appli Marjane
	2.	Choisissez votre mode de livraison :
	•	Express : chez vous en moins de 60 minutes
	•	Programmée : au créneau qui vous convient
	3.	Faites vos courses parmi plus de 15 000 produits aux prix et promos magasins
	4.	Payez en ligne (CB) ou en espèces à la livraison
	5.	Recevez vos courses rapidement ou à votre convenance

FONCTIONNALITÉS & AVANTAGES EXCLUSIFS :
	•	Une livraison sécurisée avec des véhicules réfrigérés
	•	Suivi en temps réel de votre commande
	•	Création de listes de courses personnalisées pour gagner du temps
	•	Accès aux catalogues magasin du moment pour ne manquer aucune promotion
	•	Gestion complète de votre fidélité :
	•	Consultez votre solde fidélité et rechargez-le
	•	Transférez votre solde à un proche
	•	Coupons et remises personnalisées en temps réel :
	•	Profitez d’offres adaptées à vos habitudes d’achat
	•	Accédez instantanément à vos réductions exclusives
	•	Historique détaillé de vos achats en magasin et en ligne
	•	Carte fidélité digitale intégrée :
	•	Affichée directement dans l’application
	•	Scannez-la en caisse pour bénéficier de vos avantages
	•	Visualisation en temps réel des promotions qui vous sont accordées
	•	Un service client amélioré :
	•	Live chat intégré pour une assistance instantanée
	•	Historique des réclamations consultable à tout moment, y compris celles du service après-vente

DÉCOUVREZ LA FILIÈRE M SUR L’APPLI MARJANE !

Marjane s’engage pour une alimentation plus saine et responsable avec Filière M :
	•	Des produits frais et de qualité, en circuit court
	•	Un approvisionnement direct auprès des producteurs locaux
	•	Des prix justes pour les producteurs et accessibles pour vous
	•	Une sélection rigoureuse pour garantir le meilleur de l’origine et du goût
Trouvez facilement les produits “Filière M” sur l’application Marjane et faites le choix de la qualité et de la traçabilité.

DRIVE-TO-STORE : PRÉPAREZ VOTRE VISITE EN MAGASIN !

Vous cherchez un article pour votre maison ? Avec l’application Marjane :
	•	Consultez en temps réel la disponibilité des produits en magasin
	•	Accédez à la rubrique Équipement Maison en un clic
	•	Repérez vos produits et achetez-les directement en magasin
	•	Bénéficiez des mêmes promotions et offres que dans votre hypermarché Marjane
Facilitez votre shopping avec l’application Marjane et gagnez du temps en magasin.

Téléchargez l’application Marjane dès maintenant et profitez d’une expérience de courses plus simple, plus rapide et plus personnalisée !

developer: LC Waikiki Magazacilik Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S.
description:
Everyone Deserves to Dress Well!  

Welcome to the Official LC Waikiki Shopping App!  

We're here to help you dress according to your style and budget, ensuring you feel great. Our mission, 'Everyone Deserves to Dress Well,' invites you to the most stylish destination in fashion.  

If you want to stay up-to-date with fashion and trends, enjoy easy shopping anytime, anywhere! Download the LC Waikiki app to quickly and easily access all information about our leading brand in the clothing industry.  

The easiest way to stay trendy and shop smart is right here! Download our app now and express your style.  

With our LC Waikiki shopping app:  

- Access the trendiest products in women's, men's, kids’ and baby fashion; explore our wide range of home textiles, accessories, and gifts.  
- Activate notifications and stay updated on campaigns, exclusive discounts and surprises for the app, newly added products and fashion trends.  
- Use your favourite list to save all the products you like.  
- Shop quickly and securely with various payment options.  
- Track your orders and returns in each part of the process easily and quickly.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Liya – L’épicerie mobile qui vous accompagne au quotidien

Faire ses courses n’a jamais été aussi simple. Avec Liya, vous n’avez plus besoin de perdre du temps dans les files d’attente ou de courir entre plusieurs magasins. Tout ce dont vous avez besoin est désormais à portée de main, sur votre téléphone. Fruits et légumes frais, produits bio et locaux, snacks pour vos pauses, boissons pour vos repas, produits d’entretien pour la maison ou articles de première nécessité : Liya rassemble une sélection complète de courses pour répondre à vos besoins, quand vous en avez besoin.

L’application a été pensée pour offrir une expérience agréable et fluide. Quelques clics suffisent pour parcourir nos rayons virtuels, ajouter vos produits préférés à votre panier et finaliser votre commande en toute sécurité. Le tout sans stress, sans déplacements inutiles et sans perte de temps.

La fraîcheur avant tout
Chez Liya, la qualité est une promesse. Nous travaillons chaque jour à vous proposer des produits soigneusement sélectionnés pour leur fraîcheur et leur goût. Nos fruits et légumes proviennent de producteurs qui privilégient le local et le bio, afin de vous offrir le meilleur de la saison. Chaque commande est préparée avec soin pour que vos produits arrivent chez vous aussi frais que si vous les aviez choisis directement sur l’étal.

Une livraison rapide et pratique à Kénitra et dans d’autres villes du Maroc
Nous savons que le temps est précieux. C’est pourquoi Liya met un point d’honneur à livrer vos courses rapidement, que vous soyez chez vous, au bureau ou ailleurs. À Kénitra, mais aussi dans d’autres régions du Maroc, notre service de livraison est pensé pour vous simplifier la vie. Vous commandez quand vous voulez, nous livrons à l’heure qui vous convient.

Des prix justes et des promotions régulières
Faire ses courses en ligne avec Liya, c’est aussi profiter de tarifs attractifs. Nous croyons que bien manger ne devrait pas coûter plus cher. C’est pourquoi nous proposons régulièrement des promotions exclusives, des offres spéciales et des réductions sur une large gamme de produits. Chaque semaine, découvrez de nouveaux bons plans et faites des économies sans compromis sur la qualité.

Une application simple et intuitive
Liya est conçue pour s’adapter à votre rythme. L’interface claire vous permet de trouver rapidement vos produits, d’accéder à vos achats récents et de suivre vos commandes en temps réel. Pas besoin de passer des heures à chercher : tout est organisé pour que vos courses soient terminées en quelques minutes seulement.

Un service pensé pour vous
En choisissant Liya, vous optez pour une solution moderne, pratique et humaine. Nous mettons en avant la proximité, la transparence et la satisfaction client. Nos utilisateurs apprécient la simplicité de l’application, la rapidité de la livraison, la fraîcheur des produits et la possibilité de recevoir des notifications pour ne jamais manquer une promotion ou une nouveauté.

Pourquoi adopter Liya ?
Parce que nous croyons que faire ses courses doit être un plaisir et non une contrainte. Parce que nous savons que vous recherchez des produits frais, à des prix justes, livrés rapidement et sans complications. Parce que nous pensons qu’une application doit être intuitive et agréable à utiliser. Parce que Liya vous accompagne partout et vous simplifie la vie, à Kénitra et au-delà.

Téléchargez dès aujourd’hui l’application Liya et découvrez une nouvelle façon de faire vos courses : plus moderne, plus rapide, plus pratique. Avec Liya, vous gagnez du temps, vous économisez de l’argent et vous profitez de produits toujours frais.

Liya – l’épicerie mobile au service de votre quotidien, partout au Maroc.

You may not use or make any purchases via the Privé by Zalando App (the “App”) outside of the countries in which Privé by Zalando operates and which are presented as choices for you on the App (such countries, the “Permitted Areas”). To make a purchase on the App, you must be physically located within a Permitted Area and provide a delivery address or pickup address and billing address within a Permitted Area. Further, even if you place an order for delivery or pickup in your area, you are prohibited from changing the delivery or pickup address, as well as your billing address, to an address outside of a Permitted Area. By using the App, you expressly agree that no sales via the App are permitted outside of the Permitted Areas and that you will not use or attempt to use the App to make any purchases outside of the Permitted Areas.

ZALANDO MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, THAT THE APP IS APPROPRIATE OR AVAILABLE FOR USE IN OTHER LOCATIONS OUTSIDE OF THE PERMITTED AREAS. Those who access or use the App from other jurisdictions do so at their own volition and are entirely responsible for compliance with all applicable local laws and regulations.  Unless otherwise explicitly stated, all materials found on the App are solely directed to individuals located in the Permitted Areas.

By using the App, you agree and consent to have your personal data collected, used, transferred to and processed in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice.  If you do not agree to the collection of your data in accordance with the laws of the Permitted Area and our Privacy Notice, you must stop using the App immediately.

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

Don’t miss the opportunity to download our app and unleash your creativity by designing an endless variety of outfits for every occasion. GET ORGANISED
Browse and search the IKEA range, then add products to the shopping cart and shop online. Already made a shopping list on the IKEA website? Simply log in to access it in the app.
PLAN YOUR TRIP
Find the nearest IKEA store based on your location and check opening hours and directions. See if products are in stock at your selected store so you can plan the best time to shop.
VISIT IKEA
See where products on your shopping list are located in store and get helpful hints so you don't forget anything. Scan barcodes, QR-codes and article numbers to get product information and add products to your list. Then swipe right on product to mark it as collected and left to remove it from the list.
STAY INFORMED AND SAVE
There’s always something going on at IKEA. The app keeps you up to date with events, offers and new products.

Please note that IKEA Maroc application does not support those devices which are rooted devices, or Jailbroken devices, or devices with no support to Google services.
